alert.note: Alert for Modoc County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:38PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Modoc County through 615 PM PDT... At 538 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Howards Gulch Campground, or 20 miles west of Alturas, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Howards Gulch Campground and Canby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
